statements: SELECT * FROM OceanTemperatureData ORDER BY timestamp ASC, location DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT location, temperature FROM OceanTemperatureData WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp FROM OceanTemperatureData WHERE location='Atlantic Ocean'
SELECT timestamp, location FROM OceanTemperatureData WHERE location='Pacific Ocean' AND temperature < 10
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp FROM OceanTemperatureData
SELECT * FROM OceanTemperatureData WHERE location = 'Hawaii'
SELECT timestamp, temperature FROM OceanTemperatureData WHERE temperature > 20 ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS average_temp, location FROM OceanTemperatureData GROUP BY location ORDER BY average_temp DESC
SELECT * FROM OceanTemperatureData WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31'
SELECT location, COUNT(*) AS temperature_count FROM OceanTemperatureData GROUP BY location HAVING temperature_count > 5
SELECT Temperature FROM Ocean_Temperature WHERE Time < '2023-01-01';
SELECT Time, Temperature FROM Ocean_Temperature WHERE Temperature > 25 ORDER BY Time DESC;
SELECT * FROM Ocean_Temperature ORDER BY Temperature ASC, Time DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT AVG(Temperature) AS Average_Temperature FROM Ocean_Temperature;
SELECT Time, Temperature FROM Ocean_Temperature WHERE Temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 ORDER BY Time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Ocean_Temperature WHERE Temperature = 22.5 ORDER BY Time DESC;
SELECT Time, AVG(Temperature) FROM Ocean_Temperature GROUP BY Time HAVING AVG(Temperature) > 20;
SELECT MAX(Temperature), MIN(Temperature) FROM Ocean_Temperature;
SELECT Time, Temperature FROM Ocean_Temperature WHERE EXTRACT(MONTH FROM Time) = 6 ORDER BY Time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Ocean_Temperature WHERE Temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 25 ORDER BY Temperature DESC, Time ASC;
SELECT * FROM Ocean_Temperature;
SELECT temperature, date FROM Ocean_Temperature WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT impact_description FROM Climate_Impacts WHERE impact_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM Marine_Ecosystem ORDER BY ecosystem_name DESC;
SELECT temperature, date FROM Ocean_Temperature WHERE date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Ocean_Temperature WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT Ocean_Temperature.date, Ocean_Temperature.temperature, Marine_Ecosystem.ecosystem_name FROM Ocean_Temperature INNER JOIN Climate_Impacts ON Ocean_Temperature.measurement_id = Climate_Impacts.measurement_id INNER JOIN Marine_Ecosystem ON Climate_Impacts.ecosystem_id = Marine_Ecosystem.ecosystem_id WHERE Marine_Ecosystem.ecosystem_name = 'Coral Reef';
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temp, MIN(temperature) AS min_temp FROM Ocean_Temperature;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, COUNT(measurement_id) AS total_measurements FROM Ocean_Temperature WHERE date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM Climate_Impacts WHERE impact_description ILIKE '%bleaching%' AND impact_description ILIKE '%pollution%' ORDER BY impact_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM ocean_regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM ocean_regions ORDER BY region_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, common_name FROM marine_species WHERE average_lifespan > 10;
SELECT * FROM temperature_measurements WHERE temperature_celsius < 20;
SELECT region_name, impact_description FROM ocean_regions JOIN ecosystem_impacts ON ocean_regions.region_id = ecosystem_impacts.region_id;
SELECT * FROM ocean_regions;
SELECT region_name, region_id FROM ocean_regions WHERE region_id = 2;
SELECT species_id, species_name, common_name FROM marine_species WHERE average_lifespan > 10 ORDER BY species_id DESC;
SELECT region_id, impact_description FROM ecosystem_impacts WHERE region_id = 1 AND species_id = 3;
SELECT measurement_datetime, temperature_celsius FROM temperature_measurements WHERE region_id = 3 ORDER BY measurement_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM ocean_temperature WHERE location = 'Pacific Ocean';
SELECT temperature, date FROM ocean_temperature ORDER BY temperature DESC;
SELECT species_name, population FROM marine_species WHERE habitat = 'Coral Reef';
SELECT * FROM climate_impact WHERE location = 'Arctic' AND severity = 'High';
SELECT researcher_name, project_name, data_type, date_collected FROM research_data ORDER BY date_collected ASC;
SELECT * FROM ocean_temperature WHERE location = 'Pacific' AND temperature > 20 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT species_name, habitat FROM marine_species WHERE population > 1000 ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT impact_type, severity, location FROM climate_impact WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31' ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT ecosystem_name, health_status, temperature FROM ecosystem_health WHERE temperature < 25 ORDER BY ecosystem_name ASC, temperature DESC;
SELECT researcher_name, project_name, data_type FROM research_data WHERE location = 'North Sea' AND date_collected >= '2022-06-01' ORDER BY project_name ASC
